original_text: Moses also said, “You will know that it was the Lord when he gives you meat to eat in the evening and all the bread you want in the morning, because he has heard your grumbling against him. Who are we? You are not grumbling against us, but against the Lord.”
korean_text: 모세가 또 이르되 여호와께서 저녁에는 너희에게 고기를 주어 먹이시고 아침에는 떡으로 배불리시리니 이는 여호와께서 자기를 향하여 너희가 원망하는 그 말을 들으셨음이라 우리가 누구냐 너희의 원망은 우리를 향하여 함이 아니요 여호와를 향하여 함이로다

sentences.original_text: You will know that it was the Lord
when he gives you meat to eat in the evening
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 저녁에 먹을 고기를 주실 때

sentences.original_text: and all the bread you want in the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아침에 원하는 모든 빵을 주실 때

sentences.original_text: because he has heard your grumbling against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그를 향한 당신들의 불평을 들었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: You are not grumbling against us
